data.title: Share
data.text: Showcase your fitness journey with regular updates, inspiring others and keeping yourself accountable and motivated towards achieving your goals.

data.title: Streaks
data.text: Stay committed to your fitness goals by tracking your consecutive gym visits with a streak, motivating you to maintain your streak and stay on track.

data.title: Explore
data.text: Explore new inspiration and connect with your gym buddies! Follow your favorite influencers, check out your friends' workout, and stay up to date with the latest fitness trends.

data.title: Personalize
data.text: Create a unique fitness identity and tailor your fitness journey with customized profiles, goals, and workouts.

data.title: Track
data.text: Track your progress like never before with personalized goals and detailed insights into your workouts; inspire and connect with others on their fitness journeys.

data.title: Compete
data.text: Compete with friends and other members of the community to reach fitness goals, earn badges, and climb up the leaderboard for a chance to win rewards.
